publicDescription.summary:
Make yourself at home at this welcoming family-friendly apartment, tucked in a tranquil residential setting just outside of the hustle and bustle of South Beach. Tropical tiki decor will have you channeling vacation vibes from the moment you arrive. Enjoy easy access to all of Miami Beach's best attractions, a short 5 minute walk to Ocean Drive Entertainment district and a 8 minute walk the beach (beach gear provided!). Well equipped kitchen, Netflix & Disney+, balcony & parking in premise ensure a relaxing end to the day.

WHAT GUESTS LOVE:
• Location: With a 96 walk score, the neighborhood is safe and peaceful with the nightlife located just a short walk way.
• Kitchen: Enjoy hundreds of nearby dining choices or cook at home with a well equipped kitchen.
• Beach Gear: Beach towels, umbrella and cooler are provided to save on costly rentals.

WHAT YOU SHOULD CONSIDER:
• No Laundry Machines On-Site: But the nearest laundromat is only a 3 minute walk.
• Sofa Beds: This place is perfect for 2 guests, but can accommodate up to 5 guests if you're comfortable using the sofa bed and futon. Just like a slumber party!
• No Smoking on Site: For the comfort of all residents of the building, there is no smoking or vaping permitted anywhere on premises. This includes on the balcony and walkway.
